title: Serif font to Complement ITC Blair
content: I have come across ITC Blair font, but was wondering what serif would go well with this font?
author: Capnhud

comments.content: What's the project? What is your voice? Who is your audience?

No project in particular, I just noticed the font was used by fashion designers and was wondering since it was a sans what particular serif could possibly go well with it.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
ITC Blair is a fairly neutral face, so there are thousands of serifs that would do fine with it. The best serif has much more to do with the nature of the project/brand/organization in question.

Pardon me for not understanding but what is a neutral face? Nevermind I found the answer

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
